knimeNode.name: DL Keras Network Reader
knimeNode.shortDescription: Reads a Keras model from an input file.

fullDescription.intro: This node reads a Keras deep learning model from an input file. The file can either contain a full, pre-trained model (.h5 file) or just a model specification without weights (.json or .yaml file).
fullDescription.option: The path of the input file that contains the Keras network.
